abstract: Rivals charge that Mitt Romney changed his stance on climate change, but the record may show otherwise.
snippet: Rivals charge that Mitt Romney changed his stance on climate change, but the record may show otherwise.
lead_paragraph: MANCHESTER, N.H. - Just days after Mitt Romney came under attack for seeming to waver on antiunion rules in Ohio, the former governor of Massachusetts drew scrutiny yet again for alleged shape-shifting. The issue of the moment? Climate change.

headline.main: Another Flap Over an Alleged Romney Flip
